_comments.PreToolUse: Runs before tools execute. The pre-commit hook blocks git commits if tests/linting fail.
_comments.matcher: Pattern matching tool calls. Use 'Bash(git commit*)' to match all git commit commands.
_comments.blocking: When true, hook must succeed (exit 0) for the tool to execute. False allows tool to run even if hook fails.
_comments.timeout: Maximum seconds to wait for hook execution before timing out.
